headline: Is Nucor (NUE) Still Undervalued After Its Recent Share Price Climb?
summary: Nucor (NUE) shares have been grinding higher this year, and that steady climb has investors asking whether the market is simply rewarding strong fundamentals or starting to price in an overly optimistic steel cycle. See our latest analysis for Nucor. With the share price now around $159.15, Nucor’s roughly 7 percent 1 month share price return and near 19 percent 3 month share price return signal firm, cyclical momentum backed by a robust 5 year total shareholder return above 200 percent. If...
